title: Ticket #1054: Force users entering tickets to explicitly set the visibility field
description:
In the past tickets always defaulted to public visibility.

We want to make the visibility field default to "unset", and require people creating new tickets to explicitly set the ticket to either Public or Private.

The idea is to safeguard against folks accidentally entering a ticket that should be private as public, but in a manner that is less likely to produce private tickets unnecessarily if we just changing the default to private.
